Exploring the world of
SAP User Experience(UX) with SAP Fiori
The On-Demand Webinar Replay of this webinar is now available
VIEW REPLAY
 
WEBINARS Check out our Webinar Depot for latest updates | Check it Out!!
 
 
Reimagine, Personalize and Simplify! Today's SAP Solutions, such as SAP Business Suite powered by SAP HANA, are using the SAP Fiori UX to provide a personalized, responsive and simple user experience. With SAP Fiori you can integrate your existing applications with the a highly responsive UX which can adapt across a multitude of devices including Desktop, Tablet and Mobile. With Fiori you can blur traditional computing boundaries with interactive and responsive UI elements.
 
In this On-Demand Webinar hear from our SAP experts as they take you through the SAP Fiori and what sort of Digital Enterprise Challenges it solves for you everyday. The webinar will also include a quick demonstration of Fiori as well, which will give you a great feel for the actual product. SAP Fiori focuses on the user needs, responsiveness and seamless experiences to deliver exactly what today's user wants and craves for.
